definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: And the particle size depends strongly on the treatment temperature and aging time.
sentences.chinese: 微粒的尺寸强烈依赖于制备过程的温度和陈化的时间。

sentences.english: Knowledge and timber shouldn't be much used till they are seasoned.
sentences.chinese: 知识和木材要等到陈化了再多使用。

sentences.english: The hardness of the silica column increased with the increase of aging time.
sentences.chinese: 延长陈化时间，硅胶整体柱的硬度随之增大。

definition: Pu'er tea from the Pu'er region of Yunnan
unprocessed sun-dried tea leaves used to make black or green tea
pleasant aftertaste in the back of the throat (esp. when drinking tea)
dark tea, a variety of fermented tea (e.g. Pu'er tea 普洱茶[Pu3 er3 cha2])
age of wine (i.e. how long it has been matured)
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
